items.title: Yabridge on PopOS issues
items.body:
### Thanks for giving yabridge a shot!

- [X] I read through both the troubleshooting and the known issues sections, and my issue wasn't listed there

### Problem description

I have installed Wine and Yabridge on PopOS 22.04.
Tried wrapping Valhalla Supermassive vst plugin, yabridge sync reports everything ok, but the plugin is not visible in Bitwig 5, nor Reaper or carla. When scanning plugin problems in Bitwig there is a notification that libyabridge-vst3.so is missing. Yabridge folder with this file is located in .local/$user$/shared as suggested.
I think its wine 8 installed, didnt now how to downgrade to test if thats a culprit...

### Operating system

popos 22.04

### How did you install yabridge?

directly from realease page

### yabridge version

5.05

### yabridgectl version

5.05

### Wine version

wine 8.0.2

### Plugin

valhalla supermassive

### Plugin type

VST3

### Plugin architecture

64-bit

### Host

bitwig studio 5.0.7

### Desktop environment or WM

gnome

### GPU model

amd rx580

### GPU drivers and kernel

_No response_

### Debug log

_No response_

### Anything else?

_No response_
